Articles.Content:
I am trying to take some pictures in game. How do I do this? I tried Alt+PrntScr and I am not sure that worked. Where would it pop up on my computer if it did?

Thanks for the help.

I am trying to take some pictures in game. How do I do this? I tried Alt+PrntScr and I am not sure that worked. Where would it pop up on my computer if it did?

Thanks for the help.

Print Screen doesn't normally save the picture anywhere, at least on windows. It should be in your clipboard - paste it into Paint or Imgur or something else that supports pasting

Hit F1, it will take a screenshot and store it in the "Screenshots" folder in your KSP directory.

EDIT: Alternatively, if you're using Steam to play, you can press F12 (or whatever you assigned to screenshots on steam)

Edited December 24, 2014 by Norpo
apparently it's "Screenshots", not "screenshots"
